website_summaries.verdict: A subtle navigation light you can mount on most boats without much installation or trouble.
pros: Navigation light is highly visible from the rear at nighttime
Durable construction made of ABS plastic makes it waterproof in normal or rough conditions
cons: The navigation light may require professional installation to secure it to a boat

customer_reviews.title: early corrosion
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a gradywhite's original Navigation light with this new LED light. The old light was starting to show some corrosion and I thought a new LED would be seen better. LED light is bright but the light is already corroding in less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: grady

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE ON DAY2
customer_reviews.text: Please note that I have NOT YET reached the Seller about this issue and will update my review if they address this issue, but literally installed this Day1 and was thrilled with it, and on Day2, only 3 of the 6 LEDs on the green side lit up. Tried fiddling with it and no luck. Very disappointing as I had to drill new holes in my boat as my prior holes (Malibu Ski boat) were too close together, and now I STILL dont have a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Actually a pretty nice light. Although it isn’t stainless whatsoever, It is chrome plated zinc, which should hold up great for fresh water boats, salt water boaters should look elsewhere. I was expecting a cheesy thin plastic green and red lens, buts it’s actually thick (can’t push in or distort with your hand at all). Screws are a little short (they are stainless though).
customer_reviews.author: Tad

customer_reviews.title: I like it. It is bright enough
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It is bright enough (although not insanely so) and fits the standard holes. It seems as good as anything else I have seen and the stainless part is cast, not stamped. The screws included might be short but that is east to fix.
customer_reviews.author: R. Siegfried

customer_reviews.title: It works well.  Chromed plastic, btw.
customer_reviews.text: My bow line gets caught on my light occasionally in weather, so I may have another issue with stress breaking this unit apart, but the price is right and basic wiring skills are all that's needed for a replacement. Don't know why the Rate Features asked me to rate Adhesion, as it's attached with bolts through the hull. Very bright lights. Actually used them to pull my boat into my slip after dark on the lake to watch fireworks last night.
customer_reviews.author: Goatherd

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I installed this almost 1 year ago, and it worked. I have only had the boat out a few times, and never used the light until a few days ago, early July 2019. With respect to use and exposure to the environment, it is practically new. Only half of the red, and none of the green LEDs illuminated.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin E. Ward

customer_reviews.title: led light is extremely bright and the build quality is very good. Customer service is top notch as well
customer_reviews.text: This was an exact replacement for my old, crusty incandescent bow light. This new, led light is extremely bright and the build quality is very good. Customer service is top notch as well. Not many companies reach out to see how your purchase experience was for such a small item. Overall, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Build quality is quite nice and the install was ridiculously easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the nav light on our old pontoon boat. Build quality is quite nice and the install was ridiculously easy. The LED light is actually brighter than the old light it replaced. This was a good purchase and I would buy from this supplier/manufacturer again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: C. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking unit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the original 12vdc bulb unit on my fishing pontoon. This unit looks great and is slightly larger than my original one. The lights are very bright. I will post later this year to let you all know it held up this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Houseplant

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: I dont like the plastic base at all. There is nothing that seals the bottom of it either, so water can get into the hole i drilled for the wiring. Also the unit doesnt come apart so you can attach the base first. The screw holes are too close to the unit so you have to drill and install the screws on angles. pretty dumb.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt morris

customer_reviews.title: not water proof and stoped working  JUNK light
customer_reviews.text: so i got the light only took the boat out 2 times the 3rd time was out later then I thought turned it on and bam poped tookit off the boat and the led pack blew up inside used it on a restored boat dont bother junk light I would like my money back but i dont think thats going to happen so f*&^ me right
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: love this light was an exact fit no additional holes required and just some water tight connectors and I was back on the water after normal bulb burnt out from water entering during rough sea conditions. great product and very visible.
customer_reviews.author: troy hunt

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to install on a SeaDoo for the bow nav light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as the front nav light on a SeaDoo. Haven't had an opportunity to have it on the water yet but after installing it, it appears that it will most likely work well. I'll update this review later with a pic while on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Jay E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: was of good quality, easy to install & was many times ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the order even sooner than I expected. The product, an Led boat light, was of good quality, easy to install & was many times brighter than my original light which makes me feel safer out on the water. I highly recommend your product & service. Thank you, Richard e williams
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works well, very bright.
customer_reviews.text: I have had it installed for several months now, it works great and has not corroded. the housing is chrome steel or stainless, not plastic. it did come with install hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Pond Papi

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to install with a wide base that covered up the old holes. Look's great, but not as bright as I thought it would be, but bright enough.
customer_reviews.author: scott beverly

customer_reviews.title: Very bright!
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and simple install. Had a bulb style before and the plastic had become brittle after 20 years of use. This 9ne was the exact dimensions of the originally installed light and was plug and play. Nice chrome finish too!
customer_reviews.author: beavisboots

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The nav light fit my original nav light on my 1985 Bayliner. The screws configuration was perfect, so perfect that I even used my old screws! The light was bright and the two wires were easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T.

customer_reviews.title: LED lights, very bright
customer_reviews.text: These lights are visible during the day, so you can imagine how bright they are at night. Easy to install, and the holes lined up with my prior light. This is a really good product and OEM replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Steve-o

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Over all the product is nice. I have no complaints. Been using it for four months. It is made of plastic not stainless steel. But it does the job. Keeps me legal. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The light is well made and high quality. Easy to install can’t ask for more than that
customer_reviews.author: HAROLD ANTHONY SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: It was actually a nice quality piece Was big enough to cover the old holes
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Looked nice. Was not stainless as described
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice. Was not stainless as described. It was crome plated zinc. Cannot use in saltwater.
customer_reviews.author: Tree frog

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality but so was the price. It's fine for what I needed. Maybe I'll buy an expensive one later.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great price and worked well.
customer_reviews.text: Dont have to change the bulp on these every two years with the LEDs.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Garner

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome! Very bright. Only down fall was the old Navi lights were different so I had to drill news holes to install this one. No biggie, the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: hkyplyr

customer_reviews.title: Bright and easy!
customer_reviews.text: VERY bright and easy to install! It will go through a test this fall/winter during waterfowl season in the cold and wet climate so if it doesn't hold up I will update my review. Initial thoughts is that it is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, best price I found
customer_reviews.text: Install went well, looks Durable, did use silicone under base to sell out water.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mclamb

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: The ss steel cap is very thin for the price you would think it woul be thicker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super bright. And adds a much cleaner look to the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Krankel

customer_reviews.title: Crappy...crappy and I mean crappy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Crappy little light!!! Way to small,looks like it should be on a child's tricycle!!!
customer_reviews.author: henry short

customer_reviews.title: No grommet provided
customer_reviews.text: Light works well, but there is not grommet between the light and the boat. Also broke one of the cheap screws when mounting.
customer_reviews.author: James Price

customer_reviews.title: Everything that was ordered arrived on time.
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing the lights on my boat. The bow light was fine, but the stern light was wrong for the socket that was supplied with the package. It would not plug into it.
customer_reviews.author: michael jackson

customer_reviews.title: All plastic
customer_reviews.text: Hits all three. It feels cheap, but it was cheap. It is all plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Petkus

customer_reviews.title: haven't fired it up yet
customer_reviews.text: Installed easily, two drilled holes. Seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Libhart

customer_reviews.title: It worked great !!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and it worked great for what i used it for.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Easily replaced my existing Nav light with this new LED light. It was slightly larger but that didn't matter for me. I like the LEDs and it's much brighter than my old light was.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Call

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Not super bright, but they look good and easy to install. No rubber/vinyl seal, so it requires silicone.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo Cataldo

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the one on my 45 year old boat it was the exact size of the old one even the bolt patten bright at night
customer_reviews.author: Greg Dickens

customer_reviews.title: and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. It has some heft, seems well made, and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Gagner

customer_reviews.title: Junk ,do not waste your money on this item
customer_reviews.text: Junk, defective have to return the item. Suche a waste and it's an LED so if the bulb is out, throw the entire $20 China junk out
customer_reviews.author: Greg Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Cheap foreign piece of Chinese junk. This is not waterproof or even resistant. Toy grade plastic base and housing no sturdy metal housing or prongs for sealing/blocking out water
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not a fits all part
customer_reviews.text: Part is as listed, Shipping was fast. Only issue is the fit. Just make sure it fits your application. In my scenario, the bow of my Larson requires a much smaller unit and the holes do not line up.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K.

customer_reviews.title: It was a replacement for the broken one ,Perfect fit looks great + led lights .
customer_reviews.text: It was a replacement for the broken one ,Perfect fit looks great + led lights .
customer_reviews.author: tawest

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage discoloring/corrision in less the a month 3 months later doesn't work on one side
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Olivera

customer_reviews.title: Good functional light
customer_reviews.text: Lef lights are bright. I dig em. Installation is as easy as your boat allows it to be. Could be a little more rugged design with a wide enough edge to add a grommet or seal. Other than that happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: paul sotelo

customer_reviews.title: Nice led bow light
customer_reviews.text: Mounts nice and seems to be bright. Haven't had it on boat long so time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Value
customer_reviews.text: Item was easy to install and the right fit. Just what it should be and for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: little fish big pond

customer_reviews.title: Best LED navigation light
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to install and super bright. We will out put it to the test when we do some night fishing this summer. thanks for a great affordable product.
customer_reviews.author: Zachariah Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light, installed it and it didn't work. Due to the weather that's been terrible this spring I didn't get to install it until after the return date had passed. My bad but I'm now stuck with a pos light I can't use....
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and is working as expected, very little battery drain.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace a older style led navigation light and it is by far way brighter than the one it is replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Correct part
customer_reviews.text: Works great crashed firsted trip out made it through the wreck!
customer_reviews.author: Gideon T Thibodaux

customer_reviews.title: Five minute install
customer_reviews.text: Replaced OEM bow light. Simple to install with existing wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Austin's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap
customer_reviews.text: The light has a cheap casing and is kind of large and awkward looking for what it is. I uninstalled it and put something much nicer in its place.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Solid light.
customer_reviews.text: Solid light. Works great. Easy to install on my duck boat.
customer_reviews.author: Alex N. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Check wiring
customer_reviews.text: Light did not work the wires in the light were disconnected.So i reordered from a different Provider
customer_reviews.author: Willie Freshwater

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, wish it came with a back up led
customer_reviews.author: Dutch

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and bright light compared to the old bulb that was in there. Good to be seen on the water.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Good good.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product but it corrodes very quickly on the chrome, but nice bright leds
customer_reviews.author: Isidore A.

customer_reviews.title: The light is LED and thus, polarized
customer_reviews.text: I hooked it up backwards, reversed polarity, and it did not work. Corrected the polarity and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Wood

customer_reviews.title: NOT A HIGH QUALITY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed with the quality of the product--looks and feels like a cheap plastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Light not working
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in March, looked and worked good, then all of a sudden it quit working, has power to it but just will not turn on. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Marshall M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Well made. I haven't installed it yet. But, it shouldn't be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Paul V.

customer_reviews.title: The wires going to the old one are short
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my 1988 sea ray Seville it was real easy to do and it works great and it is also bright
customer_reviews.author: kevin d huber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great price! Appears to be good quality. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Burdett

customer_reviews.title: I am not sure how this can be waterproof when ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how this can be waterproof when it does not come with a rubber mounting gasket. Very lightweight plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: Nice lights, would be alot better if you had a rubber seal for the bottom
customer_reviews.author: thomas

product_meta.title: LEANINGTECH Boat Marine LED Navigation Lights Marine Navigation Lamp, Red and Green LED for Boat Pontoon Yacht Skeeter …
feature_bullets: ➤ BRIGHT LIGHT: Two colors in one light, red for port side and green for starboard side. Bright LED bulb provides a simple and effective boat safety lighting with low power consumption. Meets USCG Requirements for 2 nautical mile visibility.
➤ DURABLE MATERIAL: Made of high quality engineering ABS plastic base and chrome plated zinc housing construction, light weight and long lasting life.
➤ IP65 WATERPROOF: No need to worry about the pouring rain or strong wind any more, the Ingress Protection Rating is up to is IP65 waterproof.
➤ EASY TO INSTALL: Easy to install and use.

➤ WIDE APPLICATION: Great boat accessories gifts. Perfect replacement lights for the front of the pontoon boat, meet wildlife and fisheries regulations. Can be use as bow light, stern light or running light, which can improve the safety when boating, especially at night. Ideal for most pontoon, yacht, skeeter, touring car, fishing boat, speed boat and other boats.
